StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMEPSOrgByID]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @ID INT ) AS SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;
SELECT [MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID], [STATE_CODE], [MEPS_NAME] AS [NAME], [MCC_CODE], [STREET], [STREET2], [CITY], [ZIP_CODE], [MEPS_CODE], [MEPS_IP_ADDRESS], [MEPS_IPADDRESS_USER], [MEPS_IPADDRESS_PWD], [USER_LOGIN], [UPDATE_DATE], [rowguid], [OrgUnitId], [EFFECTIVE_DATE], [ISOPEN], [CLOSED_DATE], [MEPS_CUTOFF_TIME], [CITY_CODE], [COUNTY_CODE], [STATE_GEO_CODE] FROM [MCRISS].[dbo].[MEPS_ORGANIZATION_LOOKUP] WHERE [MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID] = @ID;
